# KSSFK Project

## Description
Kenya School Fee Platform - A comprehensive web application for school discovery, comparison, and management

## Features
- Parent portal for school search and comparison
- School dashboard for information management
- Admin panel for compliance and penalties
- Fee analysis and comparison tools
- Vacancy management system
- Job posting system
- Upload management with approval workflow
- Analytics and reporting

## Getting Started

### Frontend
Simply open `index.html` in a web browser.

### Backend
```bash
cd backend
npm install
npm start
```

## Technology Stack
- Frontend: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript (vanilla)
- Backend: Node.js, Express.js
- Database: JSON (default), PostgreSQL/MySQL (optional)
- Charts: Chart.js

## Project Structure
- `/` - Frontend files (HTML, CSS, JS)
- `/assets/` - Images, videos, icons
- `/data/` - JSON data files
- `/components/` - HTML components
- `/backend/` - Node.js/Express server
